name: The Love Story in Kobe
overview: The Love Story in Kobe or Kobe Renai Monogatari is a Japanese-style romance adventure game., developed and published by Zainsoft, which was released in Japan in 1990. The Love Story in Kobe a short (less than 2 hour) adventure\visual novel while a love story unfolds while sightseeing in Kobe. The player takes the role of Ryosuke Nitta, who decided to move to Kobe, leaving his love behind. There he meets Kumiko Satonaka, who became an acquaintance by chance, who shows him the city of Kobe. The game uses command inputs and displays locations of the Japanese city Kobe (which is the seventh-largest city in Japan and the capital city of Hyōgo Prefecture).
